title: Didn't get LP after a win
body: OK, so as the title says I won a ranked game (solo/duo) and I didn't get any LP.

replies.body: Same, I played a solo ranked game, I won (Azir 14/3/4) and nothing happened. I didn't get LP, I don't know what grade I got. I can see that I got 94 IP for the game but there is no grade...
i had a same problem , so i stoped playing ranked , i hope we will get that lp back , but most likely , they will just say " if you are really good you will earn it back "  :)

Looks like the right people are on the job already with this LP issue. The [**EUNE Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune) shows they know about this LP weirdness, and they're still working on a fix.
Same here. Why is this happening? Some1 from Riot can check our accounts? I really need that LP`s
